info.title: Datto RMM API
info.description: Datto RMM (Remote Monitoring and Management) REST API

put.summary: Creates a new site in the authenticated user's account.
Creates a site variable in the site identified by the given site Uid.

409.description: Request aborted due to concurrent write access to this record.

put.summary: Moves a device from one site to another site.

parameters.name: deviceUid
parameters.description: The UID of the device to move to a different site

parameters.name: siteUid
parameters.description: The UID of the target site

get.summary: Fetches the activity logs.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to be returned

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Specifies the order in which records should be returned based on their creation date

parameters.name: searchAfter
parameters.description: Acts as a pointer to determine the starting point for returning records from the database. It is not advised to set this parameter manually. Instead, it is recommended to utilize the 'prevPage' and 'nextPage' URLs that are returned in the response where this parameter in already included.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Defines the UTC start date for fetching data. By default API returns logs from last 15 minutes. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Defines the UTC end date for fetching data. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Filters the returned activity logs based on their type. It can take multiple values separated by comma

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Filters the returned activity logs based on their category. It can take multiple values separated by comma

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: Filters the returned activity logs based on their action. It can take multiple values separated by comma

parameters.name: siteIds
parameters.description: Filters the returned activity logs based on the site they were created in. It can take multiple values separated by comma

parameters.name: userIds
parameters.description: Filters the returned activity logs based on the user they are associated with. It can take multiple values separated by comma

403.description: Authenticated user doesn't have access to this resource.

parameters.description: Optional. Filters results based on the provided value using the LIKE operator. Partial matches are allowed.

uid.description: Unique alphanumeric UID of this site

accountUid.description: Unique alphanumeric UID of the account to which this site belongs

componentUid.description: Component UID. List of components for the account could be retrieved via account resource

name.description: Variable name has to match one of component's variables

value.description: Value has to be convertible to the type specified in component variable

max.description: Default and maximum number of elements per AEM page (except alerts pagination)

ESXiSystemInfo.description: ESXi host system info audit data

error.description: Shows error information when request fails at the database layer

uid.description: Unique alphanumeric UID of this site

accountUid.description: Unique alphanumeric UID of the account to which this site belongs
